name: react-nested-state
description: The `react-nested-state` library provides a convenient way for React developers to manage and update nested states within functional components. It offers a hook called `useNestedState` that simplifies the process of setting nested states and provides easy-to-use setters for various levels of nesting. This can be particularly useful when dealing with complex state structures.
author: Ahmed Khan <a.manzoor743@gmail.com>
